diff_hunk:
@@ -1447,4 +1447,56 @@ b: Another tensor, of same type and shape as `a`.
 product: Pairwise cross product of the vectors in `a` and `b`.
 )doc");
 
+// --------------------------------------------------------------------------
+
+REGISTER_OP("Cumsum")
+    .Input("x: T")
+    .Input("axis: int32")
+    .Attr("reverse: bool")
+    .Output("out: T")
+    .Attr("T: numbertype")
+    .Doc(R"doc(
+Compute the cumulative sum of the tensor `x` along `axis`.
+
+The output `out` at any given index i is equal to the sum of all
+elements `x_j` of `x` with j <= i.
+
+By setting the `reverse` operation to `True`, the sum is performed in the
+reverse order. In contrast to using `tf.reverse`, this avoids copying the
+tensor.
body:
We won't be able to compile this PR right now, as Eigen hasn't been updated to the latest version yet :(
I'll have a look at implementing the `exclusive=True/False` kwarg
